channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.8
item.description:
This update no longer includes PostgreSQL 12 since it is no longer supported.

Do not install this update if you are still using PostgreSQL 12.

If you are still using PostgreSQL 12, please migrate your database to a newer version before installing this upgrade.

  • PostgreSQL 13.19 with PostGIS 3.1.12
  • PostgreSQL 14.16 with PostGIS 3.2.8
  • PostgreSQL 15.11 with PostGIS 3.3.8
  • PostgreSQL 16.7 with PostGIS 3.4.4
  • PostgreSQL 17.3 with PostGIS 3.5.2

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.7.10
item.description:
• PostgreSQL 12.22 with PostGIS 3.0.11
  • PostgreSQL 13.18 with PostGIS 3.1.11
  • PostgreSQL 14.15 with PostGIS 3.2.7
  • PostgreSQL 15.10 with PostGIS 3.3.7
  • PostgreSQL 16.6 with PostGIS 3.4.3
  • PostgreSQL 17.2 with PostGIS 3.5.0

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.
